item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, April 21, 2024 at 3:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. US lawmakers approve aid to Ukraine and Israel after months of delay
2. Trumpâ€™s $175mn bond should be invalidated, New York attorney-general says
3. Parisians struggle to cash in on Olympic Games rentals
4. Nvidia drops 10% as investors see risk in Big Tech shares
5. US lawmakers set to vote on plan to advance aid to Ukraine and Israel
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, April 21, 2024 at 3:35 AM UTC
